description:
Jircniv Rune Farlord El Nix is the current Emperor of the http://anidb.net/ch95432 [Empire]. He holds the nickname Bloody Emperor, for the numerous nobles he killed after his ascension to the throne. He is a calm and pragmatic person who is willing to purge anyone who gets in his way and replace them with whomever he sees as more fitting, be it a noble or a commoner.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Jircniv Rune Farlord El Nix
